preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 1.50 g of calcium (Ca). 
 2. Measure 9.00 g of niobium (Nb). 
 3. Measure 18.00 g of sulfur (S). 
 4. Measure 1.50 g of titanium (Ti). 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Stir thoroughly for 5 minutes to ensure uniform distribution of all components.
